description:
This cassette from the Ultegra series provides smooth, lightning quick shifting.

  • Alloy sprocket carrier keeps the cogs in check when shifting under load
  • Sprockets have a nickel-plated finish
  • Compatible with super narrow HG 10-speed chains
  • Sprocket sizes: 11-12-13-14-15-17-19-21-23-25
name: Shimano Ultegra CS-6700 10 Speed 11-25T Cassette
